long_description: The Jurek Essential Waistpack from Ultimate Direction lets you efficiently carry and access your phone, wallet and keys in a super lightweight, comfortable belt setup for use while running. Hex Mesh belt is totally breathable and extremely strong and lightweight; will not absorb moisture. Pockets are ultra-lightweight silnylon, silicone-impregnated nylon that's durable and waterproof. Zippered nonstretch pocket holds a phone with case; zippered mesh pocket holds food. Velcro pocket holds credit cards, license and keys. 3/4 in. waist webbing with stretch panel and adjustable buckle; adjustable race-bib clips. Jurek Essential Waistpack from Ultimate Direction has a Velvetex edge binding that's super soft and comfortable.
short_description: The Jurek Essential Waistpack from Ultimate Direction lets you efficiently carry and access your phone, wallet and keys in a super lightweight, comfortable belt setup for use while running.
